verses.name: Deuteronomy 22:11
verses.text: Thou shalt not wear a garment of divers sorts, as of woollen and linen together.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 22:12
verses.text: Thou shalt make thee fringes upon the four quarters of thy vesture, wherewith thou coverest thyself.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 22:13
verses.text: If any man take a wife, and go in unto her, and hate her,

verses.name: Deuteronomy 22:14
verses.text: And give occasions of speech against her, and bring up an evil name upon her, and say, I took this woman, and when I came to her, I found her not a maid:
